entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: WIND WARNING , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 8:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 10.1°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature steady near 11.
entry.summary: Showers changing to rain at times heavy near midnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature steady near 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Showers at times heavy. Temperature falling to 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning. Wind becoming light early in the afternoon then becoming east 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
